name: The Crown & The Flame: Book 3
storyline: Your enemies stole your kingdom, but now the time has come for you to raise an army, master magic, and reclaim your crown!
summary: The Crown & The Flame, Book 3 is the third and final book of The Crown & The Flame series. It succeeds its first two books, The Crown & The Flame, Book 1, and The Crown & The Flame, Book 2.
